grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 震【シン】zhen (one of the trigrams of the I Ching: thunder, east)
震源【シンゲン】hypocentre (of an earthquake), hypocenter
kun reading compounds: 震う【ふるう】to shake, to tremble, to vibrate
震える【ふるえる】to shiver, to shake, to quake, to tremble, to quaver, to quiver
